thread.title: 'Overboard' returns after 30 years with gender reversal

title: 'Overboard' returns after 30 years with gender reversal
text:
'Overboard' returns after 30 years with gender reversal Tuesday, May 01, 2018 - 01:47
Anna Faris and Eugenio Derbez talk about the differences between their new version of the 1987 classic ''Overboard'' at the Los Angeles premiere. Rough Cut - no reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Anna Faris and Eugenio Derbez talk about the differences between their new version of the 1987 classic "Overboard" at the Los Angeles premiere. Rough Cut - no reporter narration.
